name: Default Theme
css: body { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1f1c2c, #928DAB); font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; color: white; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; min-height: 100vh; overflow-x: hidden; } .img-box { border: 4px solid white; }

name: Pink Gradient
css: body { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6a88, #ff99ac); color: black; } .img-box { border: 4px solid #ffccdd; }
